name: crypto-trading-simulator
description: AI-powered crypto trading simulator with admin dashboard

scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && CI=false npm run build
scripts.test:production: npm run build:frontend && npm run local:production
scripts.clean: cd frontend && rm -rf build && rm -rf node_modules/.cache
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
